channel.title: 2.0 upload to flash not working
channel.description: I know, 2.0 is not stable, but I also tried unsuccessfully to downgrade, and some features of 2.0 look good to me. However upload to flash or sd card doesn't work. For SD card the process looks OK and I see the start.elf into home directory, but when axoloti reboots the patch is not loaded. Same for flash. When using file browser I can upload the start.elf, and patch is loaded so to use it not in live mode and axoloti app down, but after reboot it's not loaded. Any help..? Thanks

item.title: 2.0 upload to flash not working
item.dc:creator: @rpiersan
item.description:
@rpiersan wrote:

UPDATE/SOLVED: found that upload works if I unplug the MIDI IN, or electrically deactivate from my MIDI sender sequencer. Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: 2.0 upload to flash not working

item.description:
@rpiersan wrote:

I know, 2.0 is not stable, but I also tried unsuccessfully to downgrade, and some features of 2.0 look good to me. However upload to flash or sd card doesn't work. For SD card the process looks OK and I see the start.elf into home directory, but when axoloti reboots the patch is not loaded. Same for flash. When using file browser I can upload the start.elf, and patch is loaded so to use it not in live mode and axoloti app down, but after reboot it's not loaded. Any help..? Thanks
